description: Analyze the sentiment of your text

properties.name: inputText
properties.description: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

properties.name: detailedResultsNotice
properties.displayName: Sentiment scores are LLM-generated estimates, not statistically rigorous measurements. They may be inconsistent across runs and should be used as rough indicators only.

properties.name: options
properties.description: A comma-separated list of categories to analyze

properties.name: systemPromptTemplate
properties.description: String to use directly as the system prompt template

properties.name: includeDetailedResults
properties.description: Whether to include sentiment strength and confidence scores in the output

properties.name: enableAutoFixing
properties.description: Whether to enable auto-fixing (may trigger an additional LLM call if output is broken)

properties.name: batching
properties.description: Batch processing options for rate limiting

properties.name: delayBetweenBatches
properties.description: Delay in milliseconds between batches. This is useful for rate limiting.
